body_html:
IMHO the right way to do this is by using -1 for the other dimensions (and I would expect the case of having a variable number of dimensions to be particular enough to not warrant a general torch api for it).

x = torch.randn(4,5,1,3,3)

@torch.jit.script
def f(x):
    return x.expand([-1,-1,10,-1,-1])

f(x)

Supporting (more of) expand would be nice for the JIT, though...
